content: this pattern is available for free on my blog 1 but this is a great way to get an ad-free downloadable file ** hanging hand towel 2 materials and details** yarn cotton yarn sample colors pink 20 yds variegated 153 yds white 40 yds crochet hooks g h i miscellaneous yarn needle for weaving in ends one ¾ button optional 2 small black buttons for eyes sewing needle and thread embroidery floss or crochet cotton for smile finished measurements 19 long x 9 wide when folded **place mat materials and details** materials yarn 400 yards worsted weight yarn cotton or acrylic crochet hooks h i miscellaneous yarn needle for weaving in ends finished measurements 12-13 x 17-18 ** cloth 3 materials and details** yarn 200 yards worsted weight yarn cotton for cloths or acrylic crochet hooks h miscellaneous yarn needle for weaving in ends two small black buttons sewing needle black thread optional stuffing for pillows twine for creating a banner finished measurements chick - 9 5 long x 8 wide bunny - 11 long x 8 wide if you have any questions please feel free to email me heidi@snappy-tots com please include cal in the subject line i hope you will have a lot of fun crocheting with me ~ heidi 1 https //snappy-tots com/free-pattern-spring-hanging-towel/ 2 https //snappy-tots com/free-pattern-spring-hanging-towel/ 3 https //snappy-tots com/free-pattern-spring-cloths/
